sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bù hǎoyìsi, wǒ chídào le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis désolé, je suis en retard.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Sorry, I'm late.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā diàn de dōngxi hěn piányi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les articles de ce magasin sont très bon marché.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The things in this store are very cheap.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bāng wǒ jiā yīdiǎn táng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ajoutez-moi un peu de sucre, s'il vous plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please add a little sugar for me.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 医生给我开了一瓶药水。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yīshēng gěi wǒ kāi le yī píng yàoshuǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le médecin m'a prescrit une bouteille de médicament liquide.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The doctor prescribed me a bottle of liquid medicine.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège zuòwèi yǒu rén zhàn le ma?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette place est-elle occupée ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Is this seat taken?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng yǎng yī zhī xiǎo gǒu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je veux élever un petit chien.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to raise a puppy.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de tàidu hěn rènzhēn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son attitude est très sérieuse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His attitude is very serious.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng chóngfù yī biàn nǐ shuō de huà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez répéter ce que vous avez dit.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please repeat what you said.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā tíchū le yī gè hǎo jiànyì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a fait une bonne suggestion.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He made a good suggestion.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shēngbìng le, xūyào zhùyuàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est malade, il doit être hospitalisé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is sick and needs to be hospitalized.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā dǒngde hěn duō shēnghuó dàolǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle comprend beaucoup de vérités sur la vie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She understands many truths about life.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zuìjìn gōngzuò hěn máng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le travail est très chargé ces derniers temps.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Work has been very busy recently.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège xīguā yǒu sān qiānkè zhòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette pastèque pèse trois kilogrammes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This watermelon weighs three kilograms.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他数了数钱，一共一百块。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shǔ le shǔ qián, yīgòng yībǎi kuài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a compté l'argent, en tout cent yuans.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He counted the money, a total of one hundred yuan.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gùkè duì fúwù hěn bùmǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le client est très mécontent du service.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The customer is very dissatisfied with the service.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de míngzi zài míngdān shàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon nom est sur la liste.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My name is on the list.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de Yīngwén shuō de hěn liúlì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il parle anglais couramment.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He speaks English fluently.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zǒu le yī tiān, wǒ hǎo lèi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Après avoir marché toute la journée, je suis épuisé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: After walking all day, I'm so tired.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shòudào le lǎoshī de biǎoyáng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a reçu les éloges du professeur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He received praise from the teacher.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ shōudào le nǐ de yóujiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai reçu ton e-mail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I received your email.
